questions.question: The SI unit of capacitance is?

explanations.a: Correct. The Farad (F) is the SI unit of capacitance.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Coulomb is the unit of charge.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Volt is the unit of potential difference.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Ampere is the unit of current.

questions.question: The electrical conductivity is the reciprocal of electrical

explanations.a: Incorrect. Inductance is not related to conductivity.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Capacitance is unrelated to conductivity.
explanations.d: Incorrect. A valid option is available.
